Player History
Injured on 8/13/1967 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/3/1968 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/6/1969, off Dick Lines (CIN)...
Injured on 6/8/1971 with a Fractured Nose, out for 5 days...
Hit first career homerun on 6/7/1973, off Bill Parsons (PHI)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1975, hitting .529 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1975...
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1978...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1981, off Bill Slayback (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1981, off Bob Babcock (OAK)...
Injured on 5/3/1981 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1981, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1981, hitting .319 with 6 HR, 22 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against New York (A) on 9/25/1981...
Injured on 4/12/1982 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/7/1983 with a Bruised Foot, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Detroit on 7/25/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1984, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1985, hitting .409 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 10/2/1985...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Chicago (N) on 7/31/1986 (Going to CHC: CF K. Gibson, P D. Stewart. Going to CHW: LF M. Greenwell, RF J. Buhner, CF L. Dykstra, P G. Swindell, 1B F. Stubbs)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1987, hitting .520 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Philadelphia, driving in 6 runs on 4/16/1988...
Injured on 9/23/1988 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
